document_data.caption: A moon dog.
document_data.name: Moon Dog
document_data.mainbody: '''Moon dogs''' were [[celestial]]s native to the [[Elysium|Blessed Fields of Elysium]].
document_data.Description: Moon dogs resembled large dogs, about {{SI|3|ft}} tall at the shoulder, with silvery fur and obsidian-black eyes. Moon dogs had opposable digits on their front paws, allowing them to use those paws as hands. Additionally, the face had some slight human characteristics.
document_data.Personality: Moon dogs were relentless hunters of evil. Because of this, they rarely associated with anyone for long. They were generally friendly to other good creatures.
document_data.Abilities:
Moon dogs spoke the languages of [[Celestial language|celestials]] and [[Infernal language|devils]], as well as [[Common]]. They could also use telepathy to communicate with creatures within 50 feet of them.

Moon dogs possessed a wide variety of abilities, including a number of magical powers. Among them, they could always [[detect evil]], [[detect magic|magic]], [[Detect snares and pits|traps]], and [[See invisibility|invisibility]]. By licking a wound, they could [[Delay poison|slow poison]], [[remove disease]], or even [[Cure minor wounds|completely heal a minor one]].

Moon dogs could dispel illusions by whining. By barking, a moon dog could [[dispel evil]]. When one bayed, it instilled [[fear]] in all evil creatures within 80 feet of it. And when a moon dog howled, all evil creatures within {{SI|40|feet|long=yes}} of it were damaged and possibly [[dismissal|dismissed]]. The more moon dogs that were howling, the harder it was to resist the dismissal effect.
